name: James Kochalka + Pixeljam = Glorkian Warrior
blurb: James Kochalka and Pixeljam are making a video game called Glorkian Warrior.

rewards.reward: BACKER LEVEL : POWERUP - A copy of the final game and your name in the end credits under "Powerups"

BACKER LEVEL : LASER BEAM - A copy of the final game, your name in the end credits under "Laser Beams", access to beta test the game before it's released, a few Glorkian Warrior Stickers and Temporary Tattoos.

BACKER LEVEL : GUIDED MISSILE- A copy of the final game, your name in the end credits under "Guided Missles", access to beta test the game before it's released, a few Glorkian Warrior Stickers and Temporary Tattoos, A signed copy of a book of artwork by Miles Tilmann (the Pixeljam Programmer), a Glorkian Warrior minicomic by James Kochalka, and the game soundtrack (in digital form). WOW!

BACKER LEVEL : GLORKIAN WARRIOR - You get everything mentioned above (game, name in credits under "Glorkian Warriors", beta testing access, stickers, tattoos, art book, soundtrack), as well as a SIGNED Glorkian Warrior mini-comic and an original production sketch from the game (James is hand-drawing a lot of the art for the game... you get one of these drawings)

BACKER LEVEL : GLORKIAN GENERAL - You get everything mentioned above (game, name in credits under "Glorkian Generals", beta testing access, stickers, tattoos, art book, signed mini-comic, soundtrack, production sketch), as well as a 2x2 inch original painting by James Kochalka of one of the characters from the game, AND a signed James Kochalka Book or Comic (sorry, you don't get to choose) inscribed with a small original doodle.

BACKER LEVEL : GLORKIAN COMMANDER - You get everything mentioned above (game, name in credits under "Glorkian Commanders", beta testing access, stickers, tattoos, art book, signed mini-comic, soundtrack, production sketch, mini-painting), as well as  2 signed James Kochalka books or comics AND.... A free copy of every Pixeljam Game that we will ever make! (see the project description for more details)

BACKER LEVEL : GLORKIAN EMPEROR - You get everything mentioned above (game, name in credits under "Glorkian Emporers", beta testing access, stickers, tattoos, art book, signed mini-comic, soundtrack, production sketch, every Pixeljam game ever), as well as  4 signed James Kochalka books or comics,  an original 6 x 8 inch painting of something Glorkian (instead of the 2x2 inch painting)... and a 15 minute conference call with James Kochalka and Pixeljam.

BACKER LEVEL : GLORKIAN GOD - You get everything mentioned above (game, name in credits under "Glorkian Gods", beta testing access, stickers, tattoos, art book, signed mini-comic, soundtrack, production sketch, every Pixeljam game ever), as well as 5 signed James Kochalka books or comics, a 6 X 8 inch painting of the Glorkian Warrior hanging out with you! (you'll need to send James a photo of yourself), a 30 minute conference call with James and Pixeljam, plus we'll work you into the game somehow (you can help us figure this one out).
